caption:
„Your mother has cancer.” These are the words no child wants to hear about their beloved parent – and ushers in a hard reality for the person/patient diagnosed. 
 
Our colleague Christine Roth got this news when her mother was diagnosed with Breast Cancer. Her story is one that many of us can relate to. 

Christine’s personal experience shaped her professional career path in Oncology. Personal stories like hers inspires #TeamBayer to help patients with their biggest need and want: more time with their loved ones. 

At Bayer we aim to reimagining every process, project and role in the company driven by focusing everything on the mission, #HealthForAll, #HungerForNone. Advancing world-leading innovation means helping people like Christine’s mother have better outcomes. 

#BreastCancer #CancerStory #Oncology #CareerInOncology
